level.text: At the following location, the loading of vehicles shall be permitted only at curb space. All vehicles shall be prohibited from double parking to load or unload and from obstructing or impeding moving traffic.
From 15th Street to 20th Street, on the north side, “Commercial Vehicles Only, Curb Lane Loading, 9:30 a.m. – 4:00 p.m., Monday – Friday”.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 29 DCR 4656 (October 22, 1982), incorporating a text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 29 DCR 3899 (September 3, 1982); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 1223, 1224 (February 25, 2000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 3211 (May 5, 2000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5519 (July 7, 2006).
